entry.title: ีีฅึีฑีกีพีธึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีคีฅีฟีธีถีกึีถีฅีฌ ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีจ

media:group.media:title: ีีฅึีฑีกีพีธึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีคีฅีฟีธีถีกึีถีฅีฌ ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีจ
media:group.media:description:
ิปึีกีถีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีกีถีฃีกีด ีธึีฒีซีฒ ีฐีกึีพีกีฎีฅึ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีซีถ, ีซีถีนีจ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีกีพีฟีกีถีฃ ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏ ีง ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีธึีด ีีฅึีฑีกีพีธึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ. ีถีทีธึีด ีง ีกึึีฅีฌีกีฃีฅีฟ ิณีฅีธึีฃีซ ีีซีฆีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีึีก ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ิปึีกีถีจ ีทีกีฐีกีฃึีฃีผีพีกีฎ ีนีง ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ ีจีถีคีฌีกีตีถีดีกีดีข, ึ ีฐีกึีพีกีฎีถ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีซีถ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฐีกีดีกึีฅีฌ ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีฐีฅีฒีซีถีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีบีกีฐีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฝีฟีซีบีพีกีฎ ีกึีพีกีฎ ึีกีตีฌ: ีีซึีฆีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีซ ีฏีกึีฎีซึีธีพี ีีฅึีฑีกีพีธึ ิฑึึีฅีฌึีซ ีบีกีตีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีตีซีถ ีผีซีฝีฏีฅึ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅีฌ ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ:

entry.title: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space

media:group.media:title: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space
media:group.media:description:
AMADEE-24, a month-long analog training mission for a future journey to Mars, wrapped up earlier this month in Armeniaโs central Ararat region. Managed by the Austrian Space Forum, the mission brought six analog astronauts to Armenia to carry out an array of experiments, backed by hundreds of researchers and staff from more than two dozen countries. Participants told CivilNet the mission has been a catalyst for Armeniaโs burgeoning domestic space industry, which is now setting its sights on producing its own spacesuits, supporting its own analog astronauts, and setting up the regionโs first space laboratory.

entry.title: US ambassador: Washington may provide Armenia with armored ambulances

media:group.media:title: US ambassador: Washington may provide Armenia with armored ambulances
media:group.media:description:
๐ One Azerbaijani soldier was wounded in an exchange of fire between Armenian and Azerbaijani units that came after an Armenian shepherd inadvertently crossed the border while looking for his flock. ๐ Armenia plans to send a military attachรฉ to its embassy in the United Kingdom, while India will reportedly appoint its own defense attachรฉ to its diplomatic mission in Yerevan. ๐ The United States may provide Armenia with armored ambulances as part of ongoing defense discussions between the two countries. ๐ Armenia remains the most democratic country in the South Caucasus, according to the Washington-based non-profit Freedom House.

media:group.media:title: Armenian Nobel Peace Prize
media:group.media:description:
In this week's episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian unpacks the joint US, EU and Armenia meeting in Brussels. He also touches on the status of the Armenians imprisoned in Baku for over 6 months, including Ruben Vardanyan who has been nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize.
